body_html:
@gunan @meteorcloudy

OS centos 7
tf version 1.9.0
bazel version 0.15.2
cuda version 9.0
cudnn version 7201
nccl version 2.2.13

I compiled tf-serving 1.9.0 , and this error occured while loading @org_tensorflow. Here is my compiling comand

bazel build -c opt --color=yes --curses=yes --config=cuda --verbose_failures --local_resources=4096,1.0,1.0 --output_filter=DONT_MATCH_ANYTHING --copt=-mavx --cxxopt=-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 tensorflow_serving/model_servers:tensorflow_model_server

Actually, there was nothing happened while using ubuntu. But our project forced us to use centos, and I met this error.
body_text:
@gunan @meteorcloudy
OS                   centos 7
tf version         1.9.0
bazel version   0.15.2
cuda version    9.0
cudnn version  7201
nccl version      2.2.13
I compiled tf-serving 1.9.0 , and this error occured while loading @org_tensorflow. Here is my compiling comand
bazel build -c opt --color=yes --curses=yes --config=cuda  --verbose_failures --local_resources=4096,1.0,1.0 --output_filter=DONT_MATCH_ANYTHING --copt=-mavx --cxxopt=-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 tensorflow_serving/model_servers:tensorflow_model_server
Actually, there was nothing happened while using ubuntu. But our project forced us to use centos, and I met this error.
body:
@gunan @meteorcloudy 

OS                   centos 7
tf version         1.9.0
bazel version   0.15.2
cuda version    9.0
cudnn version  7201
nccl version      2.2.13

I compiled tf-serving 1.9.0 , and this error occured while loading @org_tensorflow. Here is my compiling comand

`bazel build -c opt --color=yes --curses=yes --config=cuda  --verbose_failures --local_resources=4096,1.0,1.0 --output_filter=DONT_MATCH_ANYTHING --copt=-mavx --cxxopt=-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 tensorflow_serving/model_servers:tensorflow_model_server`  

Actually, there was nothing happened while using ubuntu. But our project forced us to use centos, and I met this error.
